TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IFieldInfo

Docs.summary: Allows access to field names and field types of objects that support the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable"> interface.
Gets or sets the field names of serialized objects.
Docs.value: The field names of serialized objects.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If a name is `null`, a default parameter name is used.
This property's `get` and `set` accessors are protected by a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction?displayProperty=fullName> for the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission> with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag?displayProperty=fullName> specified.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the field types of the serialized objects.
Docs.value: The field types of the serialized objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property's `get` and `set` accessors are protected by a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction?displayProperty=fullName> for the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermission> with the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag?displayProperty=fullName> specified.
